as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

defaultOpen.description: The open state of the collapsible when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh: 可折叠对象最初呈现时的打开状态。在不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

:v-model:open.description: The controlled open state of the collapsible. Must be binded with v-model.
:v-model:open.description_zh: 可折叠的受控打开状态。必须与 v-model 绑定。

disabled.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the collapsible.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则阻止用户与可折叠对象交互。
